info.name: FOX News Dark Cyan
info.description:
Dark background to reduce eye strain, cyan links and accents.

Original foundation: style 57645 by user 108238
info.additionalInfo: 20180525 * Update to changes made by FOX website (h3, ul > li) 20161026 * Wrapper and footer edits; iframe and div#doc backgrounds 20160315 * Fixed some alert dialog colors 20150910 * Initial release To Do: remove ads expand the visible area make the articles easier to read
